body_html:
Run this script to build with v140 (Vusual Studio 2015) toolset.

Builds caffe2.dll, caffe2_gpu.dll, pybinds for cpu and gpu, detectron ops and binaries with additional deps: glog, gflags, lmdb, OpenCV 4.0. These deps are downloaded for you automatically.

Debug and Release modes are supported, both builds pass.
body_text:
Run this script to build with v140 (Vusual Studio 2015) toolset.
Builds caffe2.dll, caffe2_gpu.dll, pybinds for cpu and gpu, detectron ops and binaries with additional deps: glog, gflags, lmdb, OpenCV 4.0. These deps are downloaded for you automatically.
Debug and Release modes are supported, both builds pass.
body:
Run [this script](https://github.com/peterjc123/pytorch-scripts/blob/master/caffe2_builders/v140/auto.bat) to build with v140 (Vusual Studio 2015) toolset.

Builds caffe2.dll, caffe2_gpu.dll, pybinds for cpu and gpu, detectron ops and binaries with additional deps: glog, gflags, lmdb, OpenCV 4.0. These deps are downloaded for you automatically.

Debug and Release modes are supported, both builds pass.
